fullDescription.intro: Node for executing batch commands. More information: https://orientdb.com/docs/3.0.x/sql/SQL-batch.html
fullDescription.option: Generates a batch script according to the user defined template in 'Batch script'. This script contains the same amount of subqueries as the number of input table records.
